description: Paxeer Funding Monorepo — Web3 smart wallet onboarding platform
instructions: This is a pnpm monorepo. Always use pnpm, never npm or yarn.
Smart contracts use ZERO external dependencies — all libs/interfaces are custom.
All comments must be in English.
TypeScript strict mode, ES2022 target, bundler module resolution.
The Chrome extension provider runs as a world: MAIN content script (Manifest V3).
Backend handles auth + user management only. Wallet stats come from user-stats SDK REST API.
Paxeer Network chain ID is 125. RPC: https://public-rpc.paxeer.app/rpc
Use Conventional Commits for git messages.
